ESBMessagePipelineStorage.Name: Exception Handling
ESBMessagePipelineStorage.PipelineBlob: <ESBMessagePipeline xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.neuronesb.com/pipelines/"><Category i:nil="true" /><Description i:nil="true" /><GlobalProperties xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" /><Name>Exception Handling</Name><Properties xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" /><ReferencedAssemblies xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" i:nil="true" /><Steps><ESBMessagePipelineStep xmlns:d3p1="http://schemas.neuronesb.com/pipelines/esb/" i:type="d3p1:EsbMessageAuditPipelineStep"><Bindings xmlns:d4p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><BreakPoint>Disable</BreakPoint><Disable>false</Disable><Name>Audit Failure</Name><Uniquename i:nil="true" /><d3p1:Action>Failure</d3p1:Action><d3p1:FailureDetail i:nil="true" /><d3p1:FailureType i:nil="true" /><d3p1:IncludeBody>true</d3p1:IncludeBody><d3p1:IncludeMsgProps>true</d3p1:IncludeMsgProps><d3p1:XPath i:nil="true" /></ESBMessagePipelineStep><ESBMessagePipelineStep i:type="RethrowPipelineStepOfESBMessagexAPWb1W4"><Bindings xmlns:d4p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><BreakPoint>Disable</BreakPoint><Disable>false</Disable><Name i:nil="true" /><Uniquename i:nil="true" /></ESBMessagePipelineStep></Steps></ESBMessagePipeline>
